anyOf.title: Some
anyOf.description: An optional value.

anyOf.title: None
anyOf.description: Nothing.

anyOf.title: Some
anyOf.description: An optional value.

anyOf.title: None
anyOf.description: Nothing.

anyOf.title: Some
anyOf.description: An optional value.

anyOf.title: None
anyOf.description: Nothing.

anyOf.title: Some
anyOf.description: An optional value.

anyOf.title: None
anyOf.description: Nothing.

aiken/transaction/OutputReference.title: OutputReference
aiken/transaction/OutputReference.description:
An `OutputReference` is a unique reference to an output on-chain. The `output_index`
 corresponds to the position in the output list of the transaction (identified by its id)
 that produced that output

aiken/transaction/TransactionId.title: TransactionId
aiken/transaction/TransactionId.description:
A unique transaction identifier, as the hash of a transaction body. Note that the transaction id
 isn't a direct hash of the `Transaction` as visible on-chain. Rather, they correspond to hash
 digests of transaction body as they are serialized on the network.

aiken/transaction/credential/Address.title: Address
aiken/transaction/credential/Address.description:
A Cardano `Address` typically holding one or two credential references.

 Note that legacy bootstrap addresses (a.k.a. 'Byron addresses') are
 completely excluded from Plutus contexts. Thus, from an on-chain
 perspective only exists addresses of type 00, 01, ..., 07 as detailed
 in [CIP-0019 :: Shelley Addresses](https://github.com/cardano-foundation/CIPs/tree/master/CIP-0019/#shelley-addresses).

aiken/transaction/credential/Credential.title: Credential
aiken/transaction/credential/Credential.description:
A general structure for representing an on-chain `Credential`.

 Credentials are always one of two kinds: a direct public/private key
 pair, or a script (native or Plutus).

aiken/transaction/credential/Referenced$.title: Referenced
aiken/transaction/credential/Referenced$.description:
Represent a type of object that can be represented either inline (by hash)
 or via a reference (i.e. a pointer to an on-chain location).

 This is mainly use for capturing pointers to a stake credential
 registration certificate in the case of so-called pointer addresses.

fields.title: owner
fields.description:
Nothing means that the CDP is frozen and can be liquidated 
 against the stability pool.

fields.title: iasset
fields.description: Name of iAsset that can be minted from this position.

fields.title: minted_amount
fields.description:
The actual unit of the iAsset is minted_amount / 1e+6.
 This means that 1 BTC would be represented as minted_amount = 1_000_000.

anyOf.title: ActiveCDPInterestTracking
anyOf.description:
When CDP is not frozen, we keep track of variables necessary to calculate
 interest for a CDP.

fields.title: last_settled
fields.description: Tracks when a CDP last settled the interest.

fields.title: unitary_interest_snapshot
fields.description:
Snapshot of the unitary interest value from the interest oracle datum
 from when a CDP was last settled/created.

anyOf.title: FrozenCDPAccumulatedFees
anyOf.description:
When CDP gets frozen, the accrued interest in iAsset gets converted
 to lovelaces based on the price during the freeze transaction.
 Fees can be sent to the treasury (in the case of interest) or to 
 INDY stakers (in the case of liquidation processing fee)
 Once frozen, the interest is stored only in lovelaces.

anyOf.title: AdjustCDP
anyOf.description: Modify an existing CDP.

anyOf.title: CloseCDP
anyOf.description: Close an exisiting CDP.

anyOf.title: RedeemCDP
anyOf.description: Redeem collateral from a CDP with CR under RMR.

anyOf.title: FreezeCDP
anyOf.description: Freeze undercollaterized CDP position and prepare it for liquidation.

anyOf.title: MergeCDPs
anyOf.description:
Merge multiple frozen CDPs with the same iAsset into a single one.
 This redeemer is used with only a single UTXO at merging transaction.
 The other UTXOs use MergeAuxiliary redeemer.

anyOf.title: MergeAuxiliary
anyOf.description:
Used by all the UTXOs in a CDP merging transaction except one,
 which is using MergeCDPs redeemer.

fields.title: main_merge_utxo
fields.description: This is the reference of the UTXO consumed with MergeCDPs redeemer.

anyOf.title: Liquidate
anyOf.description: Liquidate a frozen CDP.

anyOf.title: UpdateOrInsertAsset
anyOf.description:
Update iAssetDatum or use the iAsset as an element of the distributed list
 to insert a new iAsset.

anyOf.title: UpgradeVersion
anyOf.description: UpgradeVersion to upgrade the script.

fields.title: cdp_auth_token
fields.description: Token for identifying authentic CDP output.

fields.title: cdp_asset_symbol
fields.description: Currency Symbol/Minting Policy managing the mint/burn of all iAssets.

fields.title: iasset_auth_token
fields.description: Token for identifying authentic iAsset output.

fields.title: stability_pool_auth_token
fields.description: Token for identifying authentic Stability Pool output.

fields.title: version_record_token
fields.description: Token for identifying the version record for a protocol upgrade.

fields.title: upgrade_token
fields.description: Token for identifying authentic iAsset creation or update.

fields.title: collector_val_hash
fields.description: The validator hash for the collector script.

fields.title: sp_val_hash
fields.description: The validator hash of the stability pool script.

fields.title: gov_nft
fields.description: NFT for identifying authentic governance parameters.

fields.title: min_collateral_in_lovelace
fields.description: Minimum ADA allowed in a CDP

fields.title: partial_redemption_extra_fee_lovelace
fields.description:
Partial redemptions have additional fee.
 For full redemptions this fee is not applied.

fields.title: bias_time
fields.description:
Dictates the maximum length of transaction validity, which is symmetric around the
 time passed by redeemers as the claimed current time.

 It is expected that it has a value big enough for transactions to go through even
 in times of network congestion, making the accuracy of the claimed current times
 to be in the order of hours rather than minutes.

fields.title: treasury_val_hash
fields.description: The validator hash for the treasury script.

fields.title: redemption_ratio_percentage
fields.description:
The redemption collateral ratio of the iAsset. Represented as a percentage:
 i.e. 130% would be `OnChainDecimal {get_on_chain_int: 130 * decimal_unit()}`.

fields.title: maintenance_ratio_percentage
fields.description:
The maintenance collateral ratio of the iAsset. Represented as a percentage:
 i.e. 130% would be `OnChainDecimal {get_on_chain_int: 130 * decimal_unit()}`.
 This ratio is the minimum that the user can set their CDP collateral ratio to.

fields.title: liquidation_ratio_percentage
fields.description:
The liquidation collateral ratio of the IAsset. Represented as a percentage:
 i.e. 130% would be `OnChainDecimal {get_on_chain_int: 130 * decimal_unit()}`.
 If a CDP is below this ratio, it is susceptible to liquidations.

fields.title: debt_minting_fee_percentage
fields.description:
The Debt Minting Fee Percentage. This fee is paid when iAssets are minted. 
 The minter is charged ADA for the amount of iAsset they are minting. That 
 ADA goes to INDY stakers.

fields.title: liquidation_processing_fee_percentage
fields.description:
When a liquidation occurs, a fee should be charged on the value of the debt 
 at time of seizure (freeze). That fee should be taken from the collateral of
 the CDP and sent to INDY stakers.

fields.title: stability_pool_withdrawal_fee_percentage
fields.description:
This fee is charged when withdrawing iAsset from a stability pool account.
 It is charged and settled in iAsset and redistributed across depositors
 proportionally to their deposited amount of iAsset.

fields.title: redemption_reimbursement_percentage
fields.description:
This fee is charged to the redeemer’s redemption value.
 This percentage of ADA is returned to the redeemed CDPs collateral.

fields.title: redemption_processing_fee_percentage
fields.description:
This fee is charged to the redeemer’s redemption value.
 This percentage of ADA is sent to INDY stakers.

fields.title: interest_collector_portion_percentage
fields.description:
Interest can go both to collector or treasury, this
 percentage controls the distribution.
 The complement of this portion goes to the treasury.
 Represented as a percentage:
 i.e. 40% would be `OnChainDecimal {get_on_chain_int: 40 * decimal_unit()}`.

fields.title: first_iasset
fields.description: Whether the iAsset is the first element of the distributed whitelist.

fields.title: next_iasset
fields.description: Next iAsset in the distributed whitelist.

anyOf.title: IAssetPriceDelisted
anyOf.description: This value is used when the iAsset is delisted.

anyOf.title: IAssetPriceOracleReference
anyOf.description: Used to reference an oracle with the given NFT.

fields.title: cdp_creator_nft
fields.description: NFT for identifying authentic CDPCreator output.

fields.title: cdp_asset_cs
fields.description: Currency Symbol/Minting Policy managing the mint/burn of all iAssets.

fields.title: cdp_auth_token
fields.description: Token for identifying authentic CDP output.

fields.title: iasset_auth_token
fields.description: Token for identifying authentic iAsset output.

fields.title: version_record_token
fields.description: Token for identifying the version record for a protocol upgrade.

fields.title: cdp_script_hash
fields.description: Hash of CDP script.

fields.title: collector_val_hash
fields.description: Hash of Collector script.

fields.title: min_collateral_in_lovelace
fields.description: Minimum ADA allowed in a CDP.

fields.title: bias_time
fields.description:
Dictates the maximum length of transaction validity, which is symmetric around the
 time passed by redeemers as the claimed current time.

 It is expected that it has a value big enough for transactions to go through even
 in times of network congestion, making the accuracy of the claimed current times
 to be in the order of hours rather than minutes.

fields.title: passed_time
fields.description: The time when the action `EndProposal` was processed.

fields.title: voting_end_time
fields.description: The proposal's voting end time.

fields.title: treasury_withdrawal
fields.description: Value proposed to be withdrawn from the treasury as part of the proposal.

fields.title: iasset_token
fields.description: NFT identifying authentic iAsset output in CDP contract.

fields.title: indy_token
fields.description: AssetClass of INDY token.

fields.title: current_proposal
fields.description: Number of opened Proposal. Use for indexing a Proposal.

fields.title: current_version
fields.description: Current version of the protocol, starting at 0.

fields.title: iassets_count
fields.description: Total iAssets count. Even delisted assets count towards this total.

fields.title: active_proposals
fields.description: Number of currently active proposals (opened but not closed yet).

fields.title: treasury_indy_withdrawn_amt
fields.description:
The amount of INDY that was withdrawn from treasury up to the
 amount of INDY locked in treasury at protocol initialisation.

fields.title: bias_time
fields.description:
Dictates the maximum length of transaction validity, which is symmetric around the
 time passed by redeemers as the claimed current time.

 It is expected that it has a value big enough for transactions to go through even
 in times of network congestion, making the accuracy of the claimed current times
 to be in the order of hours rather than minutes.

fields.title: dao_identity_token
fields.description: Unique token representing the treasury.

fields.title: iasset_auth_token
fields.description: Token authenticating an iAsset UTXO.

fields.title: treasury_withdrawal
fields.description: Value proposed to be withdrawn from the treasury as part of the proposal.

fields.title: current_time
fields.description: Should be the same as the one that Poll manager's EndPoll uses.

fields.title: collateral_fee_percentage
fields.description:
Fee incurred on withdrawn collateral.
 When there is a collateral decrease on a CDP,
 the fee is applied to the difference.
 This can occur on e.g. CDP close, CDP adjust (when withdrawing collateral).
 
 The unit is a percentage. This means that to set the fee to e.g. 1.5%,
 the value would be `OnChainDecimal {get_on_chain_int: 1_500_000}`.

fields.title: proposing_period
fields.description: Time window for creating all voting shards.

fields.title: total_shards
fields.description: Total numer of shards used for voting.

fields.title: minimum_quorum
fields.description: The minimum number of votes (yes + no votes) for a proposal to be possible to pass.

fields.title: max_treasury_lovelace_spend
fields.description: Maximum amount of lovelaces that can be spent at once from the treasury.

fields.title: max_treasury_indy_spend
fields.description: Maximum amount of INDY that can be spent at once from the treasury.

fields.title: destination
fields.description:
When a passed proposal asks to withdraw from treasury, the funds go to this Address.
 
 NOTE: it is constrained in the logic that it cannot be a ScriptCredential.
 The reason for keeping the `Address` type here is for usability reasons, to prevent 
 confusion on the frontend and in blockchain explorers.

fields.title: value
fields.description:
When a passed proposal asks to withdraw from treasury, this are the funds to send.

 NOTE: This cannot be of type `Value` because it could break invariants
 of the internal `Dict` since it is set by the user.

indigo/contracts/gov/types/UpgradePath.title: UpgradePath
indigo/contracts/gov/types/UpgradePath.description:
An upgrade proposal may need to contain more evidence than just the
 CurrencySymbol, like the new validator. In that case the additional
 evidence can be stored in new fields of the 'UpgradePath' data type.

fields.title: upgrade_paths
fields.description: Underlying representation of the following mapping: ValidatorHash -> UpgradePath

indigo/contracts/gov/types/ValueWithdraw.title: ValueWithdrawalItem
indigo/contracts/gov/types/ValueWithdraw.description:
This is for compatibility reasons with PlutusTx, since PlutusTx
 encodes tuples using constr.

fields.title: unitary_interest
fields.description:
Interest accrued by a micro-iAsset (10^(-6) iAsset) since the time of reference.
 
 The integer represents a number with 18 decimal places.
 This is well above the precision needed to capture the most significant digits of the
 expected minimum increase in unitary interest (0.5% for a 5 days period would result 
 in 0.005*5/365 = 0.000068493). However, having more decimal places ensures that no
 precision is lost when computing the interest for large amounts of iAsset (e.g. for a CDP
 with 1,000 iAsset, 6 decimal places of precision would result in 0.068000 iAsset to be
 paid, but 9 decimal places of precision would result in 0.068493 iAsset to be paid.
 The 18 decimal places ensure no precision is lost for CDPs with up to 10^12 iAsset.
 
 With the given precision even the lowest representable interest rate (0.0001%) 
 can be recorded every millisecond, in practice allowing any interest update.

indigo/contracts/poll/types/PollDatum.title: PollDatum
indigo/contracts/poll/types/PollDatum.description:
We're keeping this under the same sum type in comparison with PlutusTx implementation
 where manager and poll shard datum are separate types.
 Aiken misses a feature that would enable writing it the same way as our implementation
 in PlutusTx - https://github.com/aiken-lang/aiken/discussions/712#discussion-5526519
 
 Another inconsistency with the PlutusTx implementation is the `..Content` wrappers.
 This is done to achieve a better developer experience, so there is no need to pass
 individual fields one by one.
 
 This is the discussion tracking progress of an Aiken's feature proposal so no fields 
 wrapper is necessary https://github.com/aiken-lang/aiken/discussions/711

fields.title: treasury_withdrawal
fields.description: Value proposed to be withdrawn from treasury as part of the proposal.

fields.title: voting_end_time
fields.description: The time when voting ends and shards can be merged.

fields.title: created_shards_count
fields.description: Number of shards already created.

fields.title: tallied_shards_count
fields.description: Number of shards merged into PollManager.

fields.title: total_shards_count
fields.description: Total number of shards.

fields.title: proposing_end_time
fields.description: End time by when all shards have to be created.

fields.title: expiration_time
fields.description: Time after which the proposal cannot pass.

fields.title: minimum_quorum
fields.description:
The minimum number of votes (yes + no votes) for a proposal to be possible to pass.
 1 vote = 1 micro INDY

fields.title: bias_time
fields.description:
Dictates the maximum length of transaction validity, which is symmetric around the
 time passed by redeemers as the claimed current time.
 It is expected that it has a value big enough for transactions to go through even
 in times of network congestion, making the accuracy of the claimed current times
 to be in the order of hours rather than minutes.

indigo/contracts/stability_pool/sp_integ.title: SPInteger
indigo/contracts/stability_pool/sp_integ.description:
This type is used to represent numbers at the stability pool calculations.
 It wraps an Integer that represents a decimal with custom precision.

fields.title: amount
fields.description:
The deposit change amount: it is negative in case of withdrawal
 and positive in case of deposit, zero in case of claim reward.

indigo/contracts/stability_pool/types/Ep.title: EpochToScaleKey
indigo/contracts/stability_pool/types/Ep.description:
This type is introduced for compatibility reasons with PlutusTx Data encoding.
 PlutusTx encodes key in the Map using a constructor instead of using a tuple.
 For that reason, the epoch and scale is wrapped into a constructor instead of tuple.

fields.title: snapshot
fields.description: Underlying representation of the following mapping: EpochToScaleKey -> SPInteger

fields.title: epoch2scale2sum
fields.description: Underlying representation of the following mapping: EpochToScaleKey -> SPInteger

fields.title: request_collateral_lovelaces
fields.description:
Request collateral will be the ADA that will be used to pay the TX fee of the
 processing TX. Additionally, it has to cover ADA amount for 2 UTXOs to exist.
 
 Recommendation:
 For the TX fee the lovelace amount should be 5_000_000 and for the min UTXO
 collateral 2_000_000 should be fine.
 i.e. the total amount should be 2 * 2_000_000 + 5_000_000 = 9_000_000

fields.title: product_val
fields.description: Product snapshot - intermediate variable.

fields.title: deposit_val
fields.description: Deposit snapshot

fields.title: sum_val
fields.description: Sum snapshot - intermediate variable.

fields.title: epoch
fields.description:
Tracks pool emptying events.
 When a pool is emptied the epoch is incremented.

fields.title: scale
fields.description:
This is used to prevent change of `snapshotP` to 0 in a liquidation event.
 When the `snapshotP` would fall below a threshold,
 the `snapshotP` is scaled up and the scale is incremented.

indigo/contracts/staking/types/LockedAmo.title: LockedAmountValue
indigo/contracts/staking/types/LockedAmo.description:
This type is introduced for compatibility reasons with PlutusTx Data encoding.
 PlutusTx encodes value in the Map using a constructor instead of using a tuple.
 For that reason, these values are wrapped into a constructor instead of the tuple.

anyOf.title: LockedAmountValue
anyOf.description: (Vote Amount, Proposal/Poll end of voting period)

fields.title: snapshot_ada
fields.description: This represents a number with 12 decimal places.

fields.title: staking_manager_nft
fields.description: NFT identifying authentic Staking Manager output.

fields.title: staking_token
fields.description: Token identifying authentic staking position output.

fields.title: indy_token
fields.description: AssetClass of INDY token.

fields.title: poll_token
fields.description: Token identifying authentic Poll output.

fields.title: version_record_token
fields.description: Token identifying the VersionRegistry output.

fields.title: collector_val_hash
fields.description: Hash of the Collector script.

fields.title: locked_amount
fields.description:
The INDY tokens being locked for voting.
 This field is an underlying representation of the following mapping:
 Proposal/Poll Id -> LockedAmountValue

anyOf.title: Withdraw
anyOf.description: Purpose is to spend funds from the treasury by a passed proposal.

anyOf.title: PrepareWithdrawal
anyOf.description: Purpose is to prepare a single UTXO that can be spent using the `Withdraw` redeemer.

anyOf.title: Split
anyOf.description: Purpose is to be able to explicitly split different assets compressed in a UTXO.

anyOf.title: Merge
anyOf.description: Purpose is to defragment a single asset split across multiple UTXOs.

anyOf.title: CollectAda
anyOf.description: Purpose is to add ADA to the treasury script without creating a new UTXO.

fields.title: upgrade_token
fields.description: Token authenticating passed proposal.

fields.title: version_paths
fields.description: Underlying representation of the following mapping: ValidatorHash -> PolicyId
